revised_title: A Method for Determining Velocities of Saponification
tldr: The author presents a method for determining the velocities of saponification using electrical conductivity measurements. The method involves monitoring the change in conductivity of a solution containing an ester and a caustic alkali during the saponification process. The author demonstrates the method using the saponification of methyl acetate by caustic soda and provides a velocity constant for the reaction.
